name: IOHIDElement
desc: An object that contains parsed information from a HID input report.

items.name: - getUsagePage
items.desc: Returns the HID usage page associated with the element.

items.name: - getUsage
items.desc: Returns the element's specific usage value.

items.name: - getValue
items.desc: Gets the logical value that the device reported.

items.name: - getDataValue
items.desc: Gets the data value.

items.name: - getScaledValue
items.desc: Returns a scaled version of the logical value.

items.name: - getScaledFixedValue
items.desc: Returns a fixed number that represents the scaled version of the element's logical value.

items.name: - setValue
items.desc: Sets the value of the element.

items.name: - setDataValue
items.desc: Sets the data value of the element.

items.name: - getUnit
items.desc: Returns the units that you use to interpret the element's value.

items.name: - getUnitExponent
items.desc: Returns the exponent that you use to interpret the element's value.

items.name: - getLogicalMin
items.desc: Returns the minimum value that the device reports.

items.name: - getLogicalMax
items.desc: Returns the maximum value that the device reports.

items.name: - getPhysicalMin
items.desc: Returns the physical minimum for a value.

items.name: - getPhysicalMax
items.desc: Returns the physical maximum for a value.

items.name: - getTimeStamp
items.desc: Returns the timestamp associated with the element's data.

items.name: - getType
items.desc: Returns the type of information that the element contains.

items.name: - getCollectionType
items.desc: Returns the type of information that a collection element contains.

items.name: - getChildElements
items.desc: Returns the array of child elements, if any.

items.name: - getParentElement
items.desc: Returns the parent element, if any.

items.name: - getReportID
items.desc: Returns the ID of the report that contains the element's data.

items.name: - getReportCount
items.desc: Returns the number of report items associated with the element.

items.name: - getReportSize
items.desc: Returns the number of bits for each report item associated with the element.

items.name: - getCookie
items.desc: Returns the unique identifier that the system uses to associate the element with data from the input report.

items.name: - getFlags
items.desc: Returns the elementâ€™s flags.

items.name: - commit
items.desc: Commits the element value to and from the device.
